CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 21,22 Geng and co-workers synthesized two PT - based donor materials by incorporating carboxylate side chains and vinylene linkers between thiophene units.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PT |
| thiophene |
| carboxylate |
| vinylene |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid "Material Name" entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PT |
| thiophene |

The entities "carboxylate" and "vinylene" are not clearly referring to material names, but rather to chemical functional groups and a type of linker, respectively. Therefore, they have been removed from the table.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to material properties:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| carboxylate side chains |
| vinylene linkers |

These two entities are the ones that directly refer to the material properties of the donor materials synthesized by Geng and co-workers.
